casebody.data:
SAMUEL H. ADAMS v. PLAZA CONSTRUCTION COMPANY. [No. 44,

January Term, 1929.]

Decided April 2nd, 1929.

The cause was argued before Bond, C. J., Urner, Adkins, Oeeutt, Digges, Parke, and Sloan, JJ.

Wirt A. Duvall, Jr., for the appellant. C. Alex. FairbanTc, Jr., with whom was J. Milton Brandt on the brief, for the appellee. Sloan, J.,

delivered the opinion of the Court, affirming the decree.
